roleset.name: Use the Chinese language search engine "Baidu"

roles.note: Usage should be the same as "google".

example.name: just arg0
example.text: Therefore , text searches can reach the level of " when there is a question , let 's Baidu " , because text content on the Internet virtually covers all the information that we require on a daily basis .

example.name: Both args
example.text: It sparked panic among "Baiduholics" like "lost-web", who-1 [*-1] baidued everything, sometimes even without realizing it.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Newswire. No VNcls. For reference, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baidu .
